page.title: 12HOMELIFE NEAR NANCLEDRA
page.content: Mrs.Christina Carson Higher Georgia Farm Cottage. The present occupant of 2 years,has not changed the property, modernised from a farm cottage 9 years ago.{Enviromental advantages}include peaceful,rural surroundings. Disadvantages mainly concern sporadic public transport,at least 2 miles distant.A car is essential for travel to work in St.Ives. Heating is by open coal fire,powering radiators,plus electricity. The resident grows vegetables for summer consumption and keeps a small reserve supply of food in a fridge. {Social life}and entertainment are all home based,gardening,walking,music centre,T.V.(only occasionally),radio (very important), board games,reading and horse-riding. Many residents earn their living outside the area.
